name: Sujit Nair
overview:
Sujit Nair is currently employed with Microsoft India Pvt. Ltd as a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). He has been working with the Windows Serviceability team owning up components in DFS and SMB areas. Prior to Microsoft, he has couple of years of experience working with Sun Microsystems. He was primarily involved in propagating Sun's open-sourced products and has worked on developing NetBeans IDE support for Spring and Struts 2 frameworks as well as for Drupal Content Management System. Prior to Sun, he has couple of years experience with Siemens Ag, working on their proprietary Hospital Information System. He has experience working on Java, C++, J2EE, Windows Operating System, Windows Debugger, NetBeans RCP, et cetera.
Sujit has a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science from the National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal.
